net.sf.jgcs

Interface MembershipSession

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AutoCloseable, Closeable, ControlSession
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    BlockSession
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractBlockSession, AbstractMembershipSession

    public interface MembershipSession
extends ControlSession
    Allows the application to know the current group composition. This is used by protocols implementing group membership services, that agree on a common view of the group and notify the application on membership changes.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods
